channel.title: Filming on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Filming on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day #69
item.description: spent last weekend in a screenwriting workshop. this is a passion i’ve put off for a while. i’ve dabbled here & there, but i wouldn’t allow myself to dive in. with bob’s encouragement, i did it. it was a huge time & $ commitment, but it was worth it. i stretched. i was uncomfortable.

item.title: days #22-#25
item.description: i’ve been off the grid, indulging a growing passion: bob, a team of PHX creatives, & i made a full microshort this weekend. <div> we&#8217;ve been making films together since we met: </div> <div> he directs, i write, & we make magic happen. </div> <div> it&#8217;s tough working so closely & intensely sometimes, </div> <div> and we&#8217;ve learned a lot about teamwork through it all.
